abstract: An American student studying in Italy reflects on the experience of watching Amanda Knox being freed.
snippet: An American student studying in Italy reflects on the experience of watching Amanda Knox being freed.
lead_paragraph: Lily Altavena, a junior at New York University and an intern this past summer on The Choice, is studying in Florence, Italy, this fall. This is the first in an occasional series of dispatches from abroad.

headline.main: An American Student Abroad Reflects on the Knox Verdict
